duties_responsibilities.duty: Draft and negotiate complex legal agreements for transactions in the life sciences and in vitro diagnostic industry.
Advise internal client groups on legal issues related to digital health and in vitro diagnostic products and services.
Provide corporate governance and security support, including SEC reporting and compliance.
Offer transactional support for M&A activities and post-acquisition integration.
Provide healthcare compliance and regulatory legal support for fraud, waste & abuse, and regulatory licensing.
Work collaboratively with other attorneys on the drafting, negotiation, and execution of agreements.

education_certification.credential: J.D. degree (ABA accredited), Admission to practice law in a U.S. jurisdiction
